name: One4all-Chacon-DiO
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The One 4 all skill enables you to control cameras, plugs and shutters with just your voice.
Ask Alexa to turn plugs on/off, adjust shutters, view cameras and more.

To get started, please make sure that your DiO and/or Chacon products are set up in the DiO one or my Chacon application, then select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your DiO one / my Chacon account and discover your devices.

Once you know the name or group name of your devices, you can say the following:

Plugs:
- Alexa, turn on kitchen
- Alexa, turn off kitchen

Shutter:
- Alexa, open kitchen
- Alexa, close kitchen
- Alexa, raise kitchen
- Alexa, lower kitchen

Cameras:
- Alexa, show the backyard camera
- Alexa, show the feed from the front door camera

Note: Currently, cameras feed can only be displayed on Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV or Fire Tablets (Gen7 & above). Two-way talk (intercom) capability is not supported.

If you have any problems, please contact us at support@chacon.com
